meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>sacrifice</kanji> <kanji>hit</kanji> is one you do in baseball, when you hit the ball in the air, and then the person on third tags up and scores. In baseball, this can either be a <vocabulary>sacrifice bunt</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>sacrifice fly</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned the readings for both of these kanji, so you should be able to read this word already!
